plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

plugins.name: Detach Aliases
plugins.description:
Detach Aliases lets you resolve variable's aliased values from their sources. Easily detach a specific group of variables or all variables in a collection. You can target one mode at a time or all modes at once!


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  4. Detach


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering the path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input
  3. You will see all variables which are located in the path and would have aliases detached in the preview panel on the left


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  2. Detaching variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Break your collection aliases en masse!

plugins.name: Version Linker
plugins.description:
Version Linker - Link and Manage Component Versions


A powerful version management plugin for Figma that helps you link and track different versions of your components across frames.


Key Features:

• Create Main Version Links (MVL) to establish version control points

• Add Secondary Version Links (SVL) to connect related components

• Navigate instantly between linked components

• Add descriptions to track changes and updates

• Customize version colors for better visual organization

• Manage versions with easy-to-use edit and delete functions


Perfect for:

• Design systems with multiple component versions

• Teams tracking component evolution

• Projects requiring version history

• Maintaining component relationships across frames


How it works:

1. Create an MVL with a version number and color

2. Add SVLs to connect related components in different frames

3. Add descriptions to document changes

4. Use the navigation buttons to quickly move between linked components


Stay organized and maintain clear version relationships in your Figma files with Version Linker.

Color Scheme Management

plugins.name: SVG Stroke Thickness Editor
plugins.description:
이 플러그인을 이용하면 아이콘 테두리의 두께를 일괄적으로 쉽게 변경할 수 있습니다. 깔끔한 디자인 시스템을 유지하는 데 도움이 됩니다.


• 테두리 두께의 일관성을 확인합니다.

• 일괄적으로 테두리 두께를 수정 할 수 있습니다.

• 컴포넌트 및 인스턴스와 함께 작동합니다.

• 테두리 두께를 어떻게 조정할지에 대해 세 가지 옵션 중에서 선택할 수 있습니다.


이 플러그인은 아직도 작업이 진행 중인 프로젝트입니다. 댓글과 피드백은 환영입니다!


-------------


This plugin helps you batch change icon stroke sizes so that you can maintain consistency and don't have to do it manually. Helps in maintaining a clean design system.


  1. Check for stroke size consistency.
  2. Batch change stroke sizes.
  3. Works with components and instances.
  4. Chose from 3 options as to how you want to scale your stroke sizes.


This is a work in progress. Any comments and feedback would be appreciated.

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
## 🎯 核心功能

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，分别应用最适合的行高倍数

- **统一行高模式**：为所有选中文本应用相同的行高倍数，精确控制排版节奏

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages


## 🔧 Default Settings

- **Single-line text**: 1.0× (compact layout)

- **Paragraph text**: 1.68× (golden ratio for comfortable reading)

- **Supports custom adjustment** from 0.1× to 5.0×


## 🆕 Update Log - v2.0

- Added smart detection for single-line vs. paragraph text

- Introduced uniform line height mode for consistent styling

- Improved UI for a more intuitive experience

- Custom line height range support (0.1×–5.0×)

- Line height calculation now uses floor rounding for pixel-perfect alignment
plugins.tagline: 批量字号行高对齐

plugins.name: Skeema
plugins.description:
What is Skeema?

Skeema is a Figma plugin that integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. It allows frontend developers and designers to access API schemas for specific design components, making it easier to align designs with backend structures and speed up the development process.


How does Skeema work?

It connects your Figma designs to the relevant API documentation. By clicking on a design element, you can instantly view the associated endpoint documentation, eliminating the need to search through long API docs.


Who is Skeema for?

This plugin is designed for frontend and backend developers, and teams who work with API-driven applications. It helps bridge the gap between design and development, making UI-based API integration and collaboration smoother and more efficient.


What are the key benefits of using Skeema?

  1. 🚀 Faster API integration: No more switching between tools. Get API docs directly inside Figma.
  2. 🎯 Better accuracy: Ensure your design components match the API structures, reducing development errors.
  3. 👩‍💻 Streamlined collaboration: Designers and developers stay aligned, minimizing back-and-forth communication.


Do I need technical skills to use Skeema?

While Skeema is built with developers in mind, it's intuitive enough for designers to use as well. Its UI is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing Figma workflow, making it accessible for anyone involved in the design and development process.


What APIs does Skeema support?

Skeema is designed to work with OpenAPI (Swagger) specifications, but it can support a wide range of RESTful APIs. As long as your API has proper documentation, Skeema can link it to your Figma designs.


Is Skeema free?

Skeema offers both a free version with basic features and a premium version with advanced features such as team collaboration, extended API support, and priority access to updates.


Can I use Skeema with my team?

Yes! Skeema is built for collaborative teams. You can easily share API-linked designs with your development team, ensuring that everyone stays on the same page and works with the latest API documentation.
plugins.tagline: Skeema integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. Simply click to view docs.

plugins.name: Offgrid.fm
plugins.description:
Offgrid.fm is a lightweight Figma plugin that quietly monitors your design canvas and alerts you when someone is viewing your work without interacting. Whether you're collaborating on sensitive projects or just want more visibility into your workspace and helps you stay in control.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time detection of inactive observers
  2. Instantly identifies who's viewing your designs
  3. Helps protect your creative privacy and intellectual property
  4. Runs silently in the background without disrupting your workflow


Currently supports the Figma Web App only. *


Ideal for designers handling confidential work, remote teams, and creatives who value situational awareness in collaborative environments.
plugins.tagline: You've got eyes on you 👀

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: Lehuye
plugins.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.
plugins.tagline: 乐乎也数字盒子

plugins.name: Postcard Generator Experiment
plugins.description:
This plugin is a study project for the Generative AI course at the Innopolis University.


It tries it's best to generate greeting cards by combining layout generation, user-uploaded photos, a custom AI-generated poem and a thematic AI-generated background.


To run, get a token at an https://openrouter.ai and place it as the only text block on an empty page.


For help feel free to write me at levada.andrew@gmail.com


Github — https://github.com/andrewlevada/postcard-generator-experiment
plugins.tagline: A study project: a couple of llm's trying their best to design

plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

Arreglo is a Figma plugin that helps music producers visualize song arrangements. Using AI with semantic pattern recognition, it generates musically intelligent arrangements based on your instrument patterns and track names, making it easy to plan and understand song structures.
